title: Royal book shop- billing system
description: A Java-based billing system built using JFrame for a user-friendly graphical interface to manage transactions efficiently

title: Around Lanka-Tourism website
description: A dynamic tourism website, Around Lanka, developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to showcase travel destinations and services.

title: Clinic appointment management system
description: A console-based clinic booking system developed in Java for managing patient appointments efficiently through a text-based interface.
